name: Japan
interestingFacts: Japan has more than 6,800 islands and is home to the world's oldest continuously operating company.

name: Canada
interestingFacts: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

name: Brazil
interestingFacts: Brazil is home to about 60% of the Amazon Rainforest.

name: India
interestingFacts: India is the world’s largest democracy and home to the Kumbh Mela gathering visible from space.

name: Australia
interestingFacts: Australia is the only continent without an active volcano.

name: Egypt
interestingFacts: Egypt is home to the only remaining ancient wonder: the Great Pyramid of Giza.

name: Norway
interestingFacts: Norway is known for its stunning fjords and is one of the happiest countries in the world.

name: South Korea
interestingFacts: South Korea has the fastest internet speed in the world.

name: Mexico
interestingFacts: Mexico introduced chocolate, chilies, and corn to the world.

name: New Zealand
interestingFacts: New Zealand was the first country to give women the right to vote in 1893.
